resources.description: Massive multi-sport analytics collection by Christopher Long. 20+ repos covering rugby, soccer, basketball, hockey, baseball, boxing, lacrosse, AFL, volleyball, cricket, and more. Ruby/SQL scrapers with CSV data. Rugby repo updated daily from World Rugby API (1950-present).

resources.name: octonion/soccer — Multi-League Data
resources.description: 161-star soccer analytics repo: EPL, MLS, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Scottish Premiership, FIFA tournaments, Copa América, DSTV, and UEFA data. SQL schemas, CSV data, SOS models, Elo ratings, and predictions. Men's + women's.

resources.name: Olympedia Web Scraping Dataset
resources.description: Complete Olympic athlete and event results from Athens 1896 to Beijing 2022 Winter. 314,907 athlete-event results with biographical data, medal tallies, and event details. Scraped from olympedia.org with data validation and cleaning.

on_platform.description: Full dataset (314K+ Olympic results, 1896-2022) available on our platform.

datasets.description: Olympic athlete-event results from Athens 1896 to Beijing 2022 Winter. 314,907 results.

resources.name: Open Football
resources.description: Open football data project: league standings, match results, and schedules as structured text files for 50+ leagues.

resources.name: Open Science Framework (OSF)
resources.description: Open-access research data repository. Many sports analytics studies deposit their datasets, code, and supplementary materials here. Search by sport or methodology.

resources.name: OpenAlex
resources.description: Open catalog of scholarly research. We use it to discover and index sports analytics publications. REST API with generous rate limits.

resources.name: OpenF1
resources.description: Free, open API for real-time and historical Formula 1 data: car telemetry, lap times, radio messages, and pit stops.

resources.name: OpenVolley Data
resources.description: Open-source volleyball analytics: match data, play-by-play files, and DataVolley format tools for men's and women's volleyball.

resources.name: Opta / Stats Perform
resources.description: Premium event data provider used by most professional clubs and broadcasters. The gold standard for commercial football data.

resources.name: Oracle's Elixir
resources.description: League of Legends match data and analytics. CSV downloads for professional LoL match data with advanced metrics.

resources.name: Our scraper: API-Football Women's
resources.description: Scraper for API-Football targeting 8 women's leagues: NWSL, Frauen BL, D1F, Liga F, Serie A W, Eredivisie W, UWCL, WWC.

resources.name: Our scraper: Baseball (pybaseball)
resources.description: Uses pybaseball for FanGraphs batting/pitching stats and Statcast exit velocity data. Configurable seasons, stat types. Ethical: uses official public APIs.

resources.name: Our scraper: Berlin Marathon
resources.description: Scrapes Berlin Marathon results from mikatiming.com HTML. Gender, nationality, age group, net/gun times. Privacy: names are hashed.

resources.name: Our scraper: ChronoRace (EU Cycling)
resources.description: Scrapes European cycling and running results from ChronoRace's public API. UCI races, sportives, and Belgian running events.

resources.name: Our scraper: Cricket (Cricsheet)
resources.description: Downloads Cricsheet ball-by-ball data (CC-BY 4.0). Tests, ODIs, T20s plus IPL, BBL, WBBL, WPL. Both genders. Ethical: free open data downloads.

resources.name: Our scraper: Cycling (Open Data + GitHub)
resources.description: Downloads cycling data from GitHub open datasets and CyclingArchives. UCI rankings, race results. Ethical: public datasets only, no scraping of blocked sites.

resources.name: Our scraper: DiveMeets.com
resources.description: Scrapes the largest diving results database in the world (26.6M individual judge scores, 5.9M dive scores). Covers NCAA, USA Diving, AAU competitions with per-dive judge score detail. Requires session cookie management for access.

resources.name: Our scraper: FBref
resources.description: Generic, self-contained FBref scraper. Extracts schedules, player minutes per match, and player IDs for 63 competitions across 25+ countries. Includes Cloudflare bypass via cookie import, bulk scraping with pause/resume, and hidden HTML comment table extraction.

on_platform.description: scrapers/scrape_fbref.py — pip install requests beautifulsoup4 pandas cloudscraper

resources.name: Our scraper: FIS Ski Jumping
resources.description: FIS ski jumping scraper prototype. Note: fis-ski.com is fully JS-rendered with no public API. Uses the Ski Jumping Data Center dataset (288K results) as primary data source instead.

resources.name: Our scraper: Formula 1 (Jolpica + OpenF1)
resources.description: Uses Jolpica-F1 API (Ergast successor) for historical race results, standings, and drivers. Plus OpenF1 for real-time session data. Ethical: free public APIs.

resources.name: Our scraper: Hockey (MoneyPuck + NHL API)
resources.description: Downloads MoneyPuck CSV data (skaters, goalies, teams) and NHL Stats API standings. Includes PWHL women's hockey. Ethical: free CSV downloads + public APIs.

resources.name: Our scraper: IRONMAN Triathlon
resources.description: Template scraper for IRONMAN/70.3 results from competitor.com. Currently blocked by Cloudflare bot protection. Use PTO Stats for pro results instead.

resources.name: Our scraper: ISU Protocol PDF Parser
resources.description: Parses official ISU Judges Details per Skater PDFs. Extracts element-by-element GOE scores (J1-J9) and component scores from World Championships, Olympics, Europeans, Four Continents, Grand Prix, World Team Trophy + Synchronized Skating (2010-2025). Auto-detects PDF links from competition pages.

resources.name: Our scraper: MarathonGuide (US)
resources.description: Template scraper for MarathonGuide.com. Currently inactive — site redesigned as Next.js app, individual results no longer publicly accessible.

resources.name: Our scraper: Oddschecker Odds
resources.description: Scrapes 1x2 betting odds from Oddschecker.com for Bet365, Unibet, BetMGM UK (configurable). Self-discovering: finds match URLs by scraping competition pages. Fuzzy team name matching. Extracts embedded JSON from page scripts.

resources.name: Our scraper: OddsPortal Odds
resources.description: Backup odds scraper using Playwright to scrape OddsPortal.com for Bet365 and Pinnacle odds. League-level match discovery, same interface as Oddschecker scraper for easy swapping.

resources.name: Our scraper: PTO Stats (Pro Triathlon)
resources.description: Scrapes professional triathlon results from PTO Stats. IRONMAN Worlds, T100, and major races with swim/bike/run splits and PTO points.

resources.name: Our scraper: RunSignup (US Running)
resources.description: Scrapes US running race results via RunSignup's open JSON API. Major US marathons and races with gender, age, splits, and pace.

resources.name: Our scraper: SkatingScores.com
resources.description: Scrapes ISU figure skating competition results from SkatingScores.com. Senior + Junior men, women, pairs, ice dance across all ISU championships, Grand Prix, Junior Grand Prix, Challenger Series, Olympics (2003-2025). Also scrapes ISU World Standings and Season's Best scores. Uses curl-based TLS fingerprint bypass.

resources.name: Our scraper: Speed Skating
resources.description: SpeedSkatingResults.com API + ISU database extraction. Season bests, world records, participation counts by gender.

resources.name: Our scraper: Sporthive Cycling (20 sportives)

Finish times, gender, nationality. Ethical: public API, rate limited.

resources.name: Our scraper: Sporthive Running (35+ events)
resources.description: Scrapes results from 35+ major running events via Sporthive/MYLAPS API: marathons (Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Eindhoven, Lisbon), half marathons (Cardiff, Manchester, Egmond, London Landmarks), Dam tot Damloop (52K), Zevenheuvelenloop. Chip times, splits, gender, age category, nationality. Also indexes ~5.4M Kaggle marathon results. Ethical: public API, rate limited.

resources.name: Our scraper: StatsBomb + Open Data
